Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Our Story
Eteam is an award-winning production house specializing in the design and development of extended reality(XR).

In 2019, we set out to create quality XR experiences for everyone. Combining the AR, VR and MR technology, we opened our first arcade at MOKO Shopping Complex in Hong Kong. It was the first and ever XR escape room in Asia. From the storyline to decorations, it provides players with an immersive and cinematic experience.

Over the years, our team of specialists in game design and programming and 3D animations has provided innovative solutions by incorporating XR technologies that help international businesses in different industries to set themselves apart from the rest.

Achievements and Awards
First XR Arcade in Asia 2019
Cyberport Incubation Entrepreneur 2019
Hong Kong ICT Awards 2020 -  Silver Awards  (Entertainment & eSports Software)
Hong Kong Most Valuable Brand Awards 2021- The Best XR Game Design and Development
2022 Business GOVirtual Tech Awards - Excellence Award (Startup Tech Company of the Year)
NEXXCREATE Digital Entertainment Awards 2022 - Top 10 Excellence in Start-up Innovation Awards (NFT, Web3 & Metaverse)
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
The data types we intend to store include the following:

1.3D Models and Rendering Data: We have a large collection of high-quality 3D models, textures, and rendering data. This includes geometric information, materials, lighting effects, and other details essential for creating realistic visual representations.

2.Video and Image Assets: Primarily used in XR content production and playback, we rely on high-resolution video and image data. This includes 360-degree videos, panoramic photos, and static augmented reality images that help present detailed and immersive scenes.
	
3.Audio Data: For AR/VR experiences, we utilize 3D and spatial audio. This includes environmental sound effects, background music, and audio files associated with specific objects to enhance the immersive experience.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
We mainly need to convert, pack and slice the files to optimise storage and retrieval efficiency.
1, Firstly, we will adjust the format of 3d models to a smaller format according to the need, in addition, we will encode videos and images in a compatible format.
2、We will mainly use the car format to divide large files into multiple small files.
3、Additionally for data transfer
